issue.title: Use Squeezebox for all modal and iframe
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Use Squeezebox for all modal and iframe in EasySDI solution.

http://www.spiralscripts.co.uk/Joomla-Tips/using-modal-windows-with-joomla.html

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC proposes that :
- Boostrap modal must be used in priority.
- other libraries can be used if needed

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

This the responsability of the developper to implement the expected behaviour described in the wiki page.

Thsi ticket is no longer needed.
